---
name: "Data analysis"
---

###Data from Instacart users and purchases
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(p8105.datasets)
```


###Amount of products ordered from each aisle
```{r}
data("instacart")

instacart_data = instacart %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

instacart_data %>% 
  group_by(aisle) %>%  
  summarize(amount_ordered = n()) %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~aisle, y = ~amount_ordered, type = "bar",
          alpha = 0.5)
```
